step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders relaxed down as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply when pulling your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Keep that gentle downward pull on the shoulders.
Excellent! You're really getting the circular motion. Squeeze those shoulder blades back.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You're doing a great job improving shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply as you pull back to help with breathing and lymphatic flow. Keep up the good work!
